name: Monkey Explores an Island
description:
Monkey Explores an Island
by the Tinderbox Online Games Club

As part of our summer Online Games Club the group collaborated to make this fantastic text-based and pixel-art adventure using Twine and Bitsy!

Join Geff the Monkey on their travels and meet all sorts of interesting characters along the way, as you explore a tropical island.

The first part of the game is text-based, and if you explore the right places you may also be asked to visit the visual game - link here.  

Well done to the crew for a fantastic & creative game!

Cover artwork by Jamie.

For more information about Tinderbox and our Games Club click here.
